content: this is a great scrap yarn pattern if you ve been looking for one it is a very quick knit and can be customized to your preference you can wear it around a ponytail as a headband whatever you like really this pattern is written for knitters of any skill level the pattern recommends fingering weight yarn and us 8 5 mm needles for a drapey and lightweight knit however if you prefer tighter gauge you are welcome to either use a heavier weight yarn sport dk etc or a smaller needle size us 7 4 5 mm or us 6 4 mm
